roleset.name: to stop doing or manufacturing
roleset.note: DISCONTINUE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'discontinue' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from discontinue.01-v predicate notes)
DISCONTINUATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with discontinue.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from discontinuation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Troubled NBI Inc. said [0] it fired more than half its work force and is discontinuing its hardware business [*-1]to focus on its software and service operations .
example.arg: [*-1] to focus on its software and service operations

example.name: passive
example.text: While [the discussions between Delmed and National Medical Care]-1 have been discontinued [*-1], Delmed will continue [*-2] to supply dialysis products through National Medical after their exclusive agreement ends in March 1990 , Delmed said [0] [*T*-3] .

example.name: transitive with ArgM-LOC
example.text: A Kentucky Fried Chicken spokesman , however , disputed the notion that the delivery service experienced problems in some markets where testing-1 has been discontinued [*-1] [*T*-2].

example.name: Both args
example.text: Bayer's discontinuation of hamster aspirin outraged the rodent-loving community.
